content:
Sports editor

The Lloyd Noble Center decorated for new OU basketball head coach Porter Mosers inital press conference April  PERIOD

Fourstar  shooting guard Otega Oweh announced his commitment to Oklahoma live via CBS Sports HQ on Friday PERIOD

BREAKING  shooting guard OtegaOweh has committed to OUMBBall Oweh  the brother of Ravens linebacker Odafe Oweh  is officially a Sooner PERIOD  pic.twitter.comNqmAlByIdq

The 6foot3 170pound prospect from Blair Academy in Somerset New Jersey becomes new Sooners coach Porter Mosers first commitment of the  class PERIOD Owehsannouncement comes exactly one month after he visited OU on Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

When I went on a visit I just felt that atmosphere where I didnt want to leave Oweh said PERIOD The staff was great I blended in with the team and I just felt at home PERIOD It really played a big part in my decision PERIOD

I have a great support system and everyone was telling me once you go on these visits youll know whats right and whats wrong and where you want to be PERIOD The whole time I was searching for that. rivals considers Oweh the No PERIOD  shooting guard in the country and the No PERIOD  player overall for his class.Oweh chose OU over Penn State and Illinois his final three from a list of  total offers PERIOD

Success An email has been sent to  with a link to confirm list signup PERIOD

title: OU basketball: 4-star 2022 guard Otega Oweh commits to Sooners | Sports | oudaily.com
